text: Horsfieldia elongata is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to Peninsular Malaysia. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Horsfieldia elongata. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species.
